title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Competencies: Surgical Pre-Procedure Nursing Education Design Using Immersive Virtual Reality

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Perform preoperative infection prevention procedures (hand disinfection, glove wearing, etc.) with 90% accuracy in an IVRLE environment
Apply essential nursing interventions (surgical site marking, fasting verification, etc.) appropriately in 85% or more of virtual patient cases
Achieve 4 points or higher on a self-efficacy survey (5-point scale) after IVRLE training to enhance practical confidence

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
